title: The guardians: evolution exposed
description: Sawyer feels apprehensive about his new school. Although he worries about forging new friendships and finding his place on the school soccer team, his biggest trials are unseen and unexpected. When his science teacher assigns a project that conflicts with Sawyer’s beliefs, Sawyer finds himself in the midst of a great spiritual battle. Fortunately, Sawyer is not alone. God and his guardians provide him with constant aid and encouragement. Through the Christians in Sawyer’s life and the strengths deep within him, Sawyer learns lessons about courage and friendship. Along the way, he also manages to see…… evolution exposed.
author: Dawna Lee
